name: Citrix.GitHub.io
tagline: Citrix Open Source Projects and SDKs
body:
# Welcome to Citrix SDKs
Use the Citrix SDKs to extend and customize your Citrix environment. This site is under development, so please watch for new SDK additions.

## [AppDNA SDK](https://citrix.github.io/AppDNA-SDK/)
Use the AppDNA SDK to embed AppDNA functionality within a process or user interface that your users are familiar with, or embed it within a simple web page. By embedding AppDNA functionality into a process or user interface, the AppDNA tasks mesh into users' usual workflows, avoiding the need for training or familiarization with the AppDNA user interface.

## StoreFront SDK (coming soon)

## Desktop Delivery Controller SDK (coming soon)

## Desktop Director SDK (coming soon)

## Citrix Receiver for HTML5 SDK (coming soon)

## XenServer SDK (coming soon)
